doc.title: Chris Brown: Journey to South Africa
doc.plot: This SABC 1 special showcases Chris Brown's first trip to Africa, his educational trips to Mandela Museum, a visit to an orphanage and tour to numerous townships throughout Soweto and his trip to Johannesburg to visit the Oprah Winfrey Leadership Academy. The show features Chris Brown at work and at play showing how he interacts with fans, revealing aspects of his personal life and secrets that he shares exclusively to the South African audience.
